DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the role of human neutrophil peptide-1 to 3 in the occurrence of periprocedural myocardial infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Periprocedural Myocardial Infarction: the Role of Human Neutrophil Peptide-1 to 3
DOC.criteria: Troponin negative patients Stable angina Unstable angina Positive screening tests Troponin positive Technical failure of procedure Hemodynamic unstability
